EmailTemplate.name: Get Help Close Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Get Help Request {!Case.CaseNumber}: {!Case.Subject} Resolved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.CreatedBy} ,
Thank you again for contacting us regarding your issue with {!Case.Subject}, we are pleased to inform you this has been resolved. We are sorry you had to experience this problem but rest assured we are implementing corrections to prevent this from occurring again. Sincerely,
Sincerely,
NCR Interact Partner Program Team
